Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:31.180]The club isn't the best place to find a lover
[00:33.170]So the bar is where I go
[00:35.920]Me and my friends at the table doing shots
[00:37.860]Drinking fast and then we talk slow
[00:40.110]And you come over and start up a conversation with just me
[00:42.850]And trust me I'll give it a chance now
[00:45.100]Take my hand, stop, put Van the Man on the jukebox
[00:47.590]And then we start to dance, and now I'm singing like
[00:49.930]
[00:50.320]Girl, you know I want your love
[00:52.510]Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[00:55.310]Come on now, follow my lead
[00:57.300]I may be crazy, don't mind me
[00:59.260]Say, boy, let's not talk too much
[01:02.100]Grab on my waist and put that body on me
[01:04.990]Come on now, follow my lead
[01:06.690]Come, come on now, follow my lead
[01:08.130]
[01:19.310]Oh—I—oh—I—oh—I—oh—I
[01:22.580]I'm in love with your body
[01:23.970]Oh—I—oh—I—oh—I—oh—I
[01:26.960]I'm in love with your body
[01:28.550]One week in we let the story begin
[01:30.480]We're going out on our first date
[01:32.920]You and me are thrifty, so go all you can eat
[01:35.450]Fill up your bag and I fill up a plate
[01:37.800]We talk for hours and hours about the sweet and the sour
[01:40.540]And how your family is doing okay
[01:42.290]Leave and get in a taxi, then kiss in the backseat
[01:45.180]Tell the driver make the radio play, and I'm singing like
[01:47.590]
[01:47.950]Girl, you know I want your love
[01:49.990]Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[01:52.930]Come on now, follow my lead
[01:54.870]I may be crazy, don't mind me
[01:57.060]Say, boy, let's not talk too much
[01:59.610]Grab on my waist and put that body on me
[02:02.600]Come on now, follow my lead
[02:04.590]Come, come on now, follow my lead
[02:15.460]I'm in love with your body
[02:26.700]Come on, be my baby, come on
[02:29.350]Come on, be my baby, come on
[02:31.290]Come on, be my baby, come on
[02:33.730]Come on, be my baby, come on
